landing.getStarted: Get started in just three simple steps

step1.title: Add Your URLs
step1.description: Simply paste the URLs of websites you want to monitor for new offers.

step2.title: Configure Alerts

step3.title: Get Notified
step3.description: Sit back and relax. We'll monitor your sites 24/7 and alert you instantly.

supportedWebsites.title: How to get the URL?
supportedWebsites.description: Here are the websites currently supported for monitoring. For best results, follow the instructions below to get the correct URL.
supportedWebsites.olxInstructions: Search for items on OLX and copy the URL from your browser's address bar. Make sure it contains your search criteria.
supportedWebsites.howToGetUrl: How to get the correct URL
supportedWebsites.step1: Go to the supported website and perform a search with your desired criteria
supportedWebsites.step2: Ensure the URL in your browser's address bar reflects your search (contains keywords, filters, etc.)
supportedWebsites.step3: IMPORTANT: Copy the URL for a list of items (search results), NOT a specific item page
supportedWebsites.step4: Paste it in the URL field above, add an optional name, and you will get notifications when new offers are found.
